title: Price drop: EDC keychain charging cable packs secret skills
description: This 8-in-1 EDC gadget is designed for anyone who needs fast charging. Save on a keychain charging cable with USB-C and Lightning. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: This 8-in-1 EDC gadget is designed for anyone who needs fast charging. Save on a keychain charging cable with USB-C and Lightning.
text: Deals Get a GoCable 8-in-1 EDC charging cable on sale for just $20.99. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals With multiple devices to manage and little room for bulky chargers, it helps to have an all-in-one solution to keep everything powered. GoCable is up to the task. This 8-in-1 keychain charging cable is designed for modern travelers, creators and adventurers who need fast, reliable juice for almost any device It’s small enough to fit right in with your EDC essentials. And Cult of Mac Deals chops the price down to just $21.99 (regularly $49.99). GoCable: A keychain charging cable worthy of your EDC The GoCable packs an impressive array of features into a compact design. Despite its small size, this portable powerhouse can handle up to 100W of ultra-fast charging for high-demand devices like laptops, tablets and drones. And, like Mifa’s Nylon Sports Leather Apple Watch Band, its rugged construction makes it a perfect addition to your EDC. The adaptive Type-C and Lightning connectors make it compatible with iOS and Android devices and most other modern gear. Switching between devices is seamless. And with its universal compatibility, you can charge everything from your laptop to your Bluetooth earbuds with ease. GoCable’s magnetic cable-management system keeps things tidy and tangle-free, which you definitely want from a keychain charging cable. Plus, a built-in LED display gives you real-time updates on your charging progress. Plus a bottle opener and a hidden blade But the GoCable isn’t just a charging cable that fits on your keychain — it’s a multitool disguised as an everyday essential. Beyond its core function, it offers thoughtful extras. The bottle opener will come in handy during downtime. And a hidden blade can cut loose threads, open packages and tackle stubborn snack bags. These practical additions make the GoCable great for any EDC enthusiast. And the sturdy carabiner clip keeps it always within reach. Weighing in at just 40 grams, the GoCable is as portable as it is powerful. Its lightweight design is complemented by durable materials, including ABS plastic and braided nylon. The compact size makes it easy to slip into a pocket or pouch without adding bulk, and the reinforced materials mean it can handle the wear and tear of daily life. Save on GoCable, an EDC keychain charging cable with tricks up its sleeve Get a GoCable 8-in-1 EDC charging cable on sale for $21.99. That’s a 56% discount off the usual price of $49.99. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on the GoCable keychain charging cable on November 18, 2024.
html:
• Deals

With multiple devices to manage and little room for bulky chargers, it helps to have an all-in-one solution to keep everything powered. GoCable is up to the task. This 8-in-1 keychain charging cable is designed for modern travelers, creators and adventurers who need fast, reliable juice for almost any device

It’s small enough to fit right in with your EDC essentials. And Cult of Mac Deals chops the price down to just $21.99 (regularly $49.99).

GoCable: A keychain charging cable worthy of your EDC

The GoCable packs an impressive array of features into a compact design. Despite its small size, this portable powerhouse can handle up to 100W of ultra-fast charging for high-demand devices like laptops, tablets and drones. And, like Mifa’s Nylon Sports Leather Apple Watch Band, its rugged construction makes it a perfect addition to your EDC.

The adaptive Type-C and Lightning connectors make it compatible with iOS and Android devices and most other modern gear. Switching between devices is seamless. And with its universal compatibility, you can charge everything from your laptop to your Bluetooth earbuds with ease.

GoCable’s magnetic cable-management system keeps things tidy and tangle-free, which you definitely want from a keychain charging cable. Plus, a built-in LED display gives you real-time updates on your charging progress.

Plus a bottle opener and a hidden blade

But the GoCable isn’t just a charging cable that fits on your keychain — it’s a multitool disguised as an everyday essential. Beyond its core function, it offers thoughtful extras. The bottle opener will come in handy during downtime. And a hidden blade can cut loose threads, open packages and tackle stubborn snack bags.

These practical additions make the GoCable great for any EDC enthusiast. And the sturdy carabiner clip keeps it always within reach.

Weighing in at just 40 grams, the GoCable is as portable as it is powerful. Its lightweight design is complemented by durable materials, including ABS plastic and braided nylon. The compact size makes it easy to slip into a pocket or pouch without adding bulk, and the reinforced materials mean it can handle the wear and tear of daily life.

Save on GoCable, an EDC keychain charging cable with tricks up its sleeve

Get a GoCable 8-in-1 EDC charging cable on sale for $21.99. That’s a 56% discount off the usual price of $49.99.
